packageJSON.name: mjml-app
packageJSON.description: The only framework that makes responsive-email easy

scripts.dev: npm run hot-server & npm run start-hot & wait
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && npm run package && appdmg build/osx.json ./mjml-app-osx.dmg -v

releases.body:
- [MJML 3.2.2](https://github.com/mjmlio/mjml/releases/tag/3.2.2) üÜô
- Remember last used folder when exporting a template ([#69](https://github.com/mjmlio/mjml-app/issues/69)) :recycle:

- Sync Scrolling ‚öñ
- Font size in editor settings üçÖ
- [MJML 2.2](https://github.com/mjmlio/mjml/releases/tag/2.2.0) üÜô
- Fixed Package version notification on first load ‚úã
- Fix a bug which caused issues with template saves #47 üêõ

- add modal to show app version and mjml version :notebook: 
- correct bug with notification bar :bug:
- mjml 2.1.1 with new components üí•
- Fix buggy overlay hover, and prevent edit name of preset :smiley:

- Typos fixes :pencil:
- Correct app quit when closing main window :clap:
- Better windows size :computer:
- Confirmation modal when deleting template :smile:

- Thumnails support for Windows :laughing:
- Custom notifications system :point_up:
- Local bug reporter :bug:
- All presets updated with mjml@2 syntax :fireworks:
- Human windows size :computer:
- Visual helper texts in UI (for send email) :question:
- Display a notification bar when an update is available :metal:
- Dependencies updates: mjml@2 and react@15 :white_check_mark:

- New Design for modals üí°
- Home is the new AppData üçä
- Developer config folder is separated from the prod one üíâ
- EsDoc compilant comments üìÑ
- Redux crash report middleware üí•
